item.description:
Notch Session Brewery is a new local brewery doing great things in the "session" space of craft beer. Notably, they're creating new beers that are under 5% ABV that have robust flavor. You see, it's not always about alcohol content. Notch believes (and so do I) that you can create a great tasting beer that you'll want to drink (over and over again) without the worry of high ABV.

So, on Monday, August 5th, go try their BRAND NEW Hop Session, which debuts at American Craft. You can be one of the very first to try this beer --- AND MEET THE BREW MASTER!
item.name: Hop Session with Notch Session Brewery
